definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Chinese people has never regarded human beings as the hightest creature among everything else since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族自古以来从来不把人看作高于一切。

sentences.english: Economic factor is an internal basic factor in the cohesion of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 经济因素是中华民族凝聚力的内在的基本因素。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is on establishing a contemporary Chinese cultural symbol system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是创造中华民族的当代艺术符号语言。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation has always been ceremonies, reciprocity has become habit.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族素来是礼仪之邦，礼尚往来早已成为习惯。

sentences.english: Respecting the old and caring for the young is a traditional Chinese virtue.
sentences.chinese: 尊老爱幼是中华民族的传统美德。

sentences.english: Wudang Golden Hall is the gem of Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 武当金殿是中华民族的国之瑰宝。

sentences.english: The virtue of comity is Chinese nation's fine tradition.
sentences.chinese: 反对争利，倡导谦让，这是中华民族的优良传统。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation, is the Spirit in the Dapeng wings.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族，是气贯长虹的大鹏展翅。

sentences.english: However, both Chinese nation spirits and Chinese contemporary literature have transitionary limitations.
sentences.chinese: 近代中华民族精神和中国近代文学都有过渡性的局限。

sentences.english: They have taken away Chinese nation's bright civilization for the country of residence.
sentences.chinese: 他们为侨居国带去了中华民族的灿烂文明。

sentences.english: The filial piety is the traditional virtue of China.
sentences.chinese: 孝是中华民族的传统美德。

sentences.english: All of this, the ultimate goal is to revitalize the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 而所有这些，最终目的都是为了振兴中华民族。

sentences.english: Since then-people regarded the Great their Wasl as synonymous with the Chinese n.
sentences.chinese: 从那自此，人们就把长城看作是中华民族的标记。

sentences.english: Chinese people enjoy/boast the splendid five-thousand-year culture and history.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族拥有灿烂的五千多年的文化和历史。

sentences.english: Filial piety is one of China's traditional moral excellences.
sentences.chinese: 孝，中华民族的传统美德。

sentences.english: Therefore, he was enshrined in the Chinese sage and teacher for the Tai Shing.
sentences.chinese: 因此他被中华民族尊奉为大成至圣先师。

definition: descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)
lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
working people/the workers of Socialist theory or of the glorious Chinese past
lit. the flame of a burning piece of firewood passes on to the rest (idiom)/fig. (of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another
to develop/to make full use of
